column5: Thanks to you all that helped my out. If you are cruzing thru the board and need to know how to hook up the older 12/24v slector switch TM in a 24V series then see the attached diagram,,,Note in my diagram Im connected for a 24v series only ...if you want the option of 12v & 24v all you do is run the 12v white wire to +ve to battery one. Hope this helps you out! Regards, IH
